attributes.action: I want to stop the lowering of food standards in this country.
attributes.additional_details: We all require a good balanced diet to live well and adding a mix of chemicals that are not needed to our foods can be just as damaging especially for our children our food should be fresh chemical and hormonal free
attributes.background: Maintain our food standards to protect our food from chemical additions like chlorine to our food

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

Disallow Food that is Lower than the Minimum UK Production & Welfare Standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326837

Legislate in the Agriculture Bill to protect the UK’s Food & Farming Sector: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321419
